header_text: You post a short video. Your best friend comments something really embarrassing. Your followers will think that you and your friend are close.

elements.Text: Do others judge you for your friend's comment on your post?

elements.name: You post a short video. Your best friend comments something really embarrassing. Your followers will think that you and your friend are close._Mental Health_comp_question
